items.sentence: Tom really wanted to know what had happened.
Tom remembered the rabbits he used to raise.
Tom doesn\'t seem to be having any problems.
I\'ll have to tell Tom the truth eventually.
Tom won\'t stop until he gets what he wants.
You can still get that finished before 2:30.
I see that I\'m surrounded by hostile faces.
I had not expected Tom to be at the meeting.
I wish Tom wouldn\'t always talk about work.
I appreciate everything you\'ve done for me.
The heat doesn\'t seem to bother Tom at all.
Did that guy say bad things about Tom again?
Tom drank about three times as much as Mary.
I immediately knew that there was a problem.
I just want to forget about the whole thing.
Perhaps Tom and Mary should travel together.
Tom told me he wasn\'t able to speak French.
Let me tell you what\'s going to happen now.
I didn\'t even get a chance to eat anything.
I didn\'t know Tom spoke French so fluently.
